casebody.data:
Shirley Brandon v. State of Connecticut (12520)

Foti, Heiman and Hennessy, Js.

Argued February 15 decision released March 14, 1995 *904Shirley Brandon, pro se, the appellant (plaintiff). Marianne I. Horn, assistant attorney general, with whom were Judith Merrill, assistant attorney general, and, on the brief, Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Richard J. Lynch, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
